actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide cooperative forest resources assistance to States and others, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Forest and Rangeland and Renewable Resources Planning Act of 1974 to consolidate specified existing programs of cooperative forest resources assistance under such Act, and to require annual reports to Congress on such programs. Permits the Secretary of Agriculture to make consolidations payments to a State in lieu of functional cost-sharing mechanisms, formulae, or agreements.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide cooperative forest resources assistance to States and others, and for other purposes.
